NPCMessage01
All you of true courage and mettle\n who desire to hunt spirits, heed this sign!
On recrute des éradicateurs de fantôme\nSi ça vous inspire, répondez à cette annonce !
Wer den Auftrag der Geisterjagd annimmt\nund Rückgrat hat, soll bei diesem Schild beten!
Chi vuole partecipare all'eliminazione\ndegli spiriti maligni deve scrivere il proprio\nnome su questa tavola!
Vamos a aceptar hacer la exterminación de los espíritus malignos \n Aquellos que tengan coraje tengan cuidado con este aviso.
モノノケ退治を引き受けようという\n気概のある者この立札に念じよ！
요괴 퇴치 임무를 받으려고 하는\n기백이 있는 자들은 이 팻말을 읽으시오!
All you of true courage and mettle\n who desire to hunt spirits, heed this sign!
打算消滅幽靈\n而且有氣概的人，對著這塊木板祈求吧！
打算消滅幽靈\n而且有氣概的人，對著這塊木板祈求吧！
All you of true courage and mettle\n who desire to hunt spirits, heed this sign!
NPCMessage02
...is what we'd like to say, but the mission isn't ready yet.\n You'll have to wait a bit longer. Granzella Magistrate's Office
...Mais comme nous sommes en préparation, \nIl va falloir attendre un peu. Office de la magistrature de Granzella
… wollte ich gerne sagen, aber es ist noch nicht fertig\nWartet noch eine Weile. Magistratsamt Granzella
… Però dovete aspettare un attimo,\nstiamo ancora ultimando i preparativi.\nIl governo di Granzella
... Ya quisiera decir, pero ahora se está preparando \n Espera un momento. Oficina del magistrado
…と言いたいところだが今は準備中でござるゆえ\n今しばらく待たれよ。 グランゼーラ奉行所
…라고 말하고 싶지만 지금 준비중이오니\n잠시만 기다리시오. 그란젤라 봉행소
...is what we'd like to say, but the mission isn't ready yet.\n You'll have to wait a bit longer. Granzella Magistrate's Office
…雖然想這樣說，但現在還正在準備\n現在請耐心等候。 Granzella 衙門
…雖然想這樣說，但現在還正在準備\n現在請耐心等候。 Granzella 衙門
...is what we'd like to say, but the mission isn't ready yet.\n You'll have to wait a bit longer. Granzella Magistrate's Office
